remarks: A polynomial has nonpositive degree iff it is a constant. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 29-Mar-2015.)
statement:
mdegaddle.y $e |- Y = ( I mPoly R ) $.
mdegaddle.d $e |- D = ( I mDeg R ) $.
mdegaddle.i $e |- ( ph -> I e. V ) $.
mdegaddle.r $e |- ( ph -> R e. Ring ) $.
mdegle0.b $e |- B = ( Base ` Y ) $.
mdegle0.a $e |- A = ( algSc ` Y ) $.
mdegle0.f $e |- ( ph -> F e. B ) $.
mdegle0 $p |- ( ph -> ( ( D ` F ) <_ 0 <-> F = ( A ` ( F ` ( I X. { 0 } ) ) ) ) ) $.
